name: Corposprint
description:
Important phone call and crossing the city during rush hour? Huh, it would be a shame if your mobile phone ran out of power, am I right? Hurry up, run home as fast as you can and try to keep your phone alive using public chargers!

How to play?

Your goal is to reach the building at the end of the street. That’s all. Easy peasy. Wanna some tips? Here are some tips:

  • watch your battery level, be aware where the nearest charging station is,
  • avoid “landmines”,
  • avoid crowds, they will slow you down,
  • do not trust falling flowers, collecting them isn’t yur goal,
  • pigeons will not disturb you, at least I think so.
Controls ButtonActionLef arrow or AMove leftRight arrow or DMove rightUp arrow or W or SpacebarJumpShiftCharging a phone Music
  • By: David Renda
  • Title: 8 Bit Surf
